page.title: 12HELICOPTER TO ST.MARTINS IOS
page.content: 1985 is an important year for the St.Martin's flower farmers,because this year has brought the British Airways Helicopter here regularly for the first time.Approximately 8000 flower boxes have been exported direct from St.Martins,to reach the markets sooner than before and in better condition through less handling of the boxes. The helicopter swooped over us like a large eagle,then glided in like a cloud,but by no means as quiet as a cloud.Then the tractors came onto the scene,the co-pilot helped the loader and farmers to load the boxes.The last flowers were loaded;the helicopter took along time to take off with the extra weight,but when it did it swooped right over my head.When all the tractors had gone it looked as if nothing had happened.
